StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateCandidateOCCR]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonId int, @MosCode varchar(4), @StateCode varchar(2), @CountyCode varchar(3), @CityCode varchar(4), @PriorityPref varchar(1), @UserLogin varchar(30)
AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_OCCR WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonID) BEGIN --- UPDATE OCCR UPDATE CANDIDATE_OCCR SET MOS_CODE = @MosCode, STATE_CODE = @StateCode, CITY_CODE = @CityCode, COUNTY_CODE = @CountyCode, PRIORITY_PREF = @PriorityPref, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonID END ELSE BEGIN --- INSERT PRIOR SERVICE INSERT CANDIDATE_OCCR (MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, MOS_CODE, STATE_CODE, COUNTY_CODE, CITY_CODE, PRIORITY_PREF, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@PersonID, @MosCode, @StateCode, @CountyCode, @CityCode, @PriorityPref, @UserLogin, GETDATE()) END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
